channel.title: Photoshop on What Make Art
channel.description: Recent content in Photoshop on What Make Art

item.title: Why is my Photoshop brush a crosshair?
item.description: Transcript Why can’t I see the edges of my Photoshop brush? Why is my Photoshop brush a crosshair? This can be very annoying when you’re trying to draw in Photoshop with a brush but you only see a crosshair instead of the full outline of your brush size. How can I fix this? The simple fix is to press caps lock and then this toggles your Photoshop brush between an outline and the crosshairs.
